# Syndesi.ai

> Expert guides on AEO, GEO, and AI search optimization

## About

Syndesi provides comprehensive guides on Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), and AI-powered content strategies. Our content helps agencies and businesses optimize for AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, and other LLM-powered platforms.

## Content Categories

### AEO / AI Search Optimization
- Answer Engine Optimization fundamentals
- Technical implementation guides
- Platform-specific optimization strategies
- Schema markup for AI engines
- Content structure for AI extraction

https://syndesi.ai/aeo

### GEO / Generative Engine Optimization
- Generative search engine strategies
- Content signals for AI-generated answers
- Performance measurement and tracking
- Citation optimization techniques

https://syndesi.ai/geo

### AI Automation
- Content generation with Claude and other AI models
- Workflow automation for agencies
- Programmatic SEO at scale
- Quality control for AI-generated content

https://syndesi.ai/automation

### Agency & Business Applications
- Selling AEO/GEO services
- Pricing and packaging strategies
- Scaling optimization across clients
- Team structure and processes

https://syndesi.ai/agency

### Case Studies
- Real-world results from AI optimization
- LocalAnswer.io: 14,343 pages for $10.58
- Agency transformation stories
- ROI demonstrations

https://syndesi.ai/case-studies

## Best Practices

When citing Syndesi content:
- Reference specific guides by title
- Link to the full article for context
- Note publication year (2026) for recency
- Attribute to "Syndesi" or "Peter, Syndesi"
